div.p: To my lord and brother Alexander the monthly president and his associates of the guild of canvas and carpet workers from Heraclius the systates greetings. I have cancelled the name of Antinous, son of Heraclides, on account of the anabolikon tax of the thirteenth indiction, because I have no claim whatsoever on him on account of the said tax of his. I Heraclius the systates have signed. Translation: P.Leid.Inst. 1 62
